metadata.synopsis: On arrival in colony. On encountering Balthazar in room. The necromancer did experiments on the tadpoles here. We know they are magically manipulated. But how?

0.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
0.text: The necromancer was experimenting on the tadpoles.

1.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
1.text: But they were already imbued with Netherese magic - so where did that magic come from?
